name: Cryptid Obscura
description:
Our submission to Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

You're The Cryptid Paparazzi!

  • 🐸 Try not to be distracted by the vibrant, bustling city life and prove the existence of the Loveland Frog Man!
  • 📝 Refer to your handy dandy notes to identify the Frog among the crowd. He will have only THREE random traits out of the SIX possible traits!
  • 📷 Left Click to zoom in on the passersby, and take a shot of suspicious characters with the Right Click.
  • 💯 Take a screenshot of your high score and post it in the comments!
  • 🔥🔥 Bonus: share screenshots of your favourite fire fits 🔥🔥

NOTE: we recommend playing the Windows build as it has better performance.

Controls Zoom In / Out
Left Click
Take Photo (While Zoomed In)
Right Click
Pan Camera (While Zoomed In)
WASD / Arrows

Caden (@dino_sire): Programming

Simone (@gummywormfarm): Sets & Sketches

Tyler (@limitaudio): Music & SFX

Karina (@swan_karina): Characters & UI
